page.title: 13MEDIA
page.content: ALL DAILY PAPERS ARE AVAILABLE TO PEOPLE IN THIS DISTRICT, BUT THEY FAVOUR LOCAL NEWSPAPERS WHICH ARE HEREFORD TIMES, WESTERN MAIL, THE BRECON AND RADNOR, TIMES GAZETTE AND MID WALES JOURNAL. THE PARISH MAGAZINE IS ALSO IMPORTANT TO HOUSEHOLDS, AS IT NOT ONLY GIVES NOTICE OF CHURCH SERVICES IT ALSO ADVERTISES LOCAL SOCIAL EVENTS. ALTHOUGH THE AREA IS IN WALES, WELSH CHANNELS ARE UNOBTAINABLE ON TELEVISION BUT DUE TO A BOOSTER INSTALLED RECENTLY THERE IS GOOD RECEPTION OF BBC AND ITV PROGRAMMES FROM THE MIDLANDS TRANSMITTER. RADIO IS POPULAR. LOCAL RADIO TRANSMISSION IS FROM RADIO WALES, RADIO WYVERN AND RADIO SUNSHINE (LUDLOW).
